character.statement: It's time to announce our winners! I'm sweating with joy!
It's time to announce our winners! Snakey is squeezing me very tight.
It's time to announce our winners and then I will take a nap.
And now for second place...Who could it be?
And now for second place...A simply wonderful person.
And second place... A dear friend.
And now the moment weâ€™ve all been waiting for. Who will reign as our Reality TV champions?
I hope one of them is me.
